title: WTB - T206 cards - paying strong on a few guys

posts.post_title: WTB - T206 cards - paying strong on a few guys
posts.post_content:
I have been trying for weeks to buy some of these guys ... I am almost done buying so this is my last shot at getting some from Net54

I need:

Elmer Flick
Jap Barbeau
Al Bridwell
Donie Bush
Bill Carrigan
Davy Jones
Tommie Leach
Lefty Leifield
Hans Lobert
Fred Parent
Harry Pattee
Hub Perdue
Al Shaw
Doc White
What kind of condition are you looking for?
Need to know grade sought, any interest in semi-rare backs, etc.
looking for FR to VG ... maybe VG-EX

JF---

I've got a SGC 50 VG/EX 4 I'd be willing to sell---it's a beautiful, clean card w/ nice white borders.

It is one of the the cards from the Roy Mellinger collection:

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=118774&highlight=Ray+Mellinger[/url]


$249.00 delivered--Paypal Family & Friends, personal ck or MO.
Thanks but I need lower grade
I have Al Shaw and Bill Carrigan in the grade you're looking for.  SGC graded.  PM me and I'll send you the details/images.
I have lefty leifield batting with a cycle 460 back in SGC 30.  One sold on Eba a couple weeks ago in a 3.5 for $350.  What's your offer price?
